name: gulp-eslint
notes: Gulp plugin for ESLint linting during build workflows. The name pattern 'gulp-*' indicates it's a Gulp plugin. Configured in gulpfile.js as part of Gulp's streaming build system (gulp.src('src/**/*.js').pipe(eslint()).pipe(eslint.format()).pipe(eslint.failAfterError())). Used during development/build workflows to automatically lint JavaScript files using ESLint. Requires filesystem access (fs.createReadStream) to read source files. Part of the Gulp plugin ecosystem. Not applicable to Workers which is a runtime environment, not a build environment. Modern linters use ESLint CLI directly.
errorMessage: Package gulp-eslint needs manual test configuration - do not use generic Object.keys() test
